reviewText: Why didn't the fall Guy just come out? I was waiting for it to ccome out, but you wan us to sign up for it. I got the first season, and i hope that the rest of the seasons will dcom eout, the 2-5 seasons. And i hope it comes out, thank you for answereing me.i voted for other people's reviews and agreed with what said they happen to say and i like what they happen to say. and  also the last i wrote to you was 1 years ago and i am still waiting for the rest of the series to come out, so what's the holdup? i not getting any younger and other people out there that are waiting are the same way, i'm in my late 40's . We want to know how much longer are we going to have to wait and not going to wait another 2 or 3 years , i think it's dumb for you to keep the fans waiting for them. Get them out, we can be patient for so long. You put them out then make the fans wait for so long for the rest to come out. i will wait for another year and if you haven't brought them out by then, you will be hearing from me again.

reviewText: I think if they wait long enough to release season 2 3 4 & 5 we who grew up loving the 80s will all be dead. HELLO HELLO the folks who grew up with this show are NOW THE 40 YEAR OLD PARENTS WHO HOLD THE MONEY NOW!!! Another 30 years and I'll be on Social Security (if the socialist democrats don't bankrupt us first) and I won't have the extra money. Either release them now or sell the rights!!!As far as the show, this was and is a typical fun 80's show. Light and funny. A family show that all ages and genders could watch. Action, comedy and warm actors and actresses. If you don't have season 1 then get it. Then help me push for the rest of the series!!!
summary: WTF ANY DAY NOW FEEL FREE TO RELEASE SEASONS 2 3 & 4

reviewText: I think it does have something to do with the music on the show..........But why did Charmed have NO problem quickly getting released? I mean, look at the music that was on that show. I own those episodes and I can't tell that ANY of the music was taken out and nothing was altered...Almost every episode after the opening and teaser, there was a song that was popular at the time....They popped that series out like nobody's business.....What makes this show any different? I don't understand.
summary: Charmed Had Popular Music - What makes this series different?

reviewText: I am with everyone come on and release Seasons 2-5!!! This is absolutely ridiculas to release only one season of The Fall Guy not to mention only Seasons 1.5 The Big Valley. Does Fox have something against Lee Majors? Fox always does this to the fans, which is a little more than irritating! Where is the loyalty? Lee Majors is a great actor not to mention the other great actors and actresses who also deserves better than this. I would love to be able to show this and other great T.V. Series with Lee Majors to my kids my son 13 and my daughter 11, but this rate it may never happen!! One more time please release these shows complete Fox for the fans!

reviewText: I've been eagerly awaiting for them to release THE FALL GUY's 1982-83 Season on DVD and I don't know what is taking them so long to put THE FALL GUY's 2nd Season on DVD, especially since THE FALL GUY's 2nd Season was already released on DVD a year & a half ago back in June of 2007.As a matter of fact, this is also the season when Colt's agent Terri Michaels(Markie Post) joins the show replacing her predecessor Big Jack(Jo Ann Pflug)along with the fact this THE FALL GUY's Second Season had more action and more drama in it than the First Season did, despite the fact that this 1982-1983 Season left us mourning the loss of Big Jack.THE FALL GUY's 1982-83 Season also takes me back to memory lane when ABC had moved THE FALL GUY from 9PM to 8PM on ABC's Wednesday night line-up followed by DYNASTY at 9PM.THE FALL GUY's Second Season also takes me all the way back to memory lane to when ABC's motto was "Come On Along To ABC", since that was ABC's motto during this season of THE FALL GUY.It was also interesting seeing guest stars like*Mary Crosby in the "Strange Bedfellows" episode during her co-starring days on DALLAS.*Heather Locklear in the "Just A Small Circle Of Friends" episode during her co-starring days as Sammy Jo on DYNASTY and Officer Stacey Sheridan on T.J. HOOKER and before her co-starring days as Amanda Woodward on MELROSE PLACE*Don Stroud after his co-starring days as Capt. Lussen on THE NEW DRAGNET*Judith Chapman in the "Death Boat" episode before her co-starring days on YOUNG & THE RESTLESS, DAYS OF OUR LIVES, and ONE LIFE TO LIVE*Paul Mantee in "The Chameleon" episode before his co-starring days as Cmdr. Clayton on HUNTER
summary: Come on Season 2 where are you?
